title: [Tuts Plus] Getting Started with Semantic UI Video Tutorial-KTR
description:
[Tuts Plus] Getting Started with Semantic UI Video Tutorial-KTR
================================================================


PUBLISHER....: Tuts Plus
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
AUTHOR.......: Lawrence Turton
RELEASE DATE..: 2014.10.07
RUNTIME......: 5.7 hours



About this course::

Semantic UI is a well-crafted front-end framework with professional features and a robust API. This course will guide you from start to finish through the process of building a four-page website with a wide range of user interface (UI) elements, using Semantic UI.

By the end of the course, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be well acquainted with all the features and benefits of Semantic UI.


Topics include:

1.Introduction and Setting Up
1.1Introduction
1.2Working With Semantic UI
1.3Setting Up the Workspace


2.Developing a Header & Footer With Semantic UI
2.1Mobile Menu & Button UI
2.2Floating Menu
2.3Header Icon & Polish
2.4Header & Footer With Grid
2.5Footer Menu, Icons & Feed


3.Creating a Homepage With Semantic UI
3.1Home Page Grid, Icon, Image & Pop-Up
3.2Finishing Up the Home Page


4.Creating an About Page With Semantic UI
4.1Image & Full Page Dimmer
4.2Table & Comment Section


5.Creating a Portfolio With Semantic UI
5.1Portfolio Items, Label & Rating
5.2Step & Accordion
5.3Step & Accordion Communication


6.Creating a Contact Page With Semantic UI
6.1Contact Page Segment & Input
6.2Form Fields & Message Block
6.3Setting Up The Form
6.4Checkbox & Drop-Down
6.5Form Validation (Part One)
6.6Form Validation (Part Two): Segment Loader
6.7Form Validation (Part Three)
6.8Shape Module
6.9Finishing the Form & Adding a Modal Dialog


7.Finishing Touches & Conclusion
7.1Modal & Progress Bar
7.2Conclusion
